title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
From version 1.13.4, you can verfy the following updates:

  • Restored basic support for Compact Scene Navigation and Monk's Scene Navigation - though I would love if you use my Scene Folder Navigation feature instead! Give it a try!
  • Fixed player presence indicators on Scene Navigation items
  • Adjusted input selection styles for better visibility
  • Fixed an issue with Custom Fonts dropdowns, introduced by last updates

Check details and send requests on Github repo or Discord
